heading: Failure of owner to perform work
text:
If no action in accordance with the modified precept is undertaken by the
     owner or applicant for modification within the time period provided in the modification following the granting of such
     application, the commissioner may direct the department of housing preservation and development or the department of
     citywide administrative services or other authorized agency to execute the original precept, provided however that prior to such
     execution, notice shall be provided by regular mail to the owner of the unsafe building, structure or premises and applicant for
     the modification if other than the owner, at his or her last known address. The owner shall continue to have the right to req uest
     the commissioner to modify the requirements of the precept prior to the execution thereof.
